en.title: {{Software}} Developer
en.text: Being a part of service based team, I have worked on mulitple techstacks and projects across domains giving me a varied experience
list: Optimised the frontend of [[ROLL20]] by 25% in Backbone JS by Lazy-Loading
Contributed to [[Harbour Bridge]], a Google’s project to convert databases to Google Spanner
Worked on its frontend in Javascript, Web-Components while using FireStore for its structured data and [[JEST]] for frontend testing
Build a learning portal in [[Next.JS]] and [[graphQl]] while [[Django]] for backend and [[mySQL]] for db

hi.title: {{सॉफ़्टवेयर}} डेवलपर
hi.text: सेवा-आधारित टीम का हिस्सा होने के नाते, मैंने विभिन्न टेक स्टैक्स और प्रोजेक्ट्स पर अलग-अलग डोमेन्स में काम किया है, जिससे मुझे विविध अनुभव प्राप्त हुआ।
list: [[ROLL20]] के फ्रंटएंड को Backbone JS में Lazy-Loading द्वारा 25% तक ऑप्टिमाइज़ किया
[[Harbour Bridge]] में योगदान दिया, जो Google का प्रोजेक्ट है डेटाबेस को Google Spanner में बदलने के लिए
इसके फ्रंटएंड पर Javascript, Web-Components में काम किया और FireStore का उपयोग किया इसके structured data के लिए तथा [[JEST]] का उपयोग किया frontend testing के लिए
[[Next.JS]] और [[graphQl]] में एक लर्निंग पोर्टल बनाया, जबकि [[Django]] का उपयोग backend के लिए और [[mySQL]] का उपयोग db के लिए किया

en.title: {{Software}} Engineer
en.text: Worked on mulitple products of innovaccer ranging from masala design system to Innote UI
list: Contributed to the product [[Innote - UI]] used by doctors of ACOs for patient overview and better patient data management
Improved application features by leveraging ReactJS and Redux, styled with Tailwind CSS, tested using Jest, and bundled with Webpack.
Worked on desktop app using Electron Js. and mobile app as PWA which made the doctor’s vetting task quick and saved by 2 hrs a day amounting to 25% increased revenue
Pioneered UI for [[Config diff]] like git for backend teams saving their debugging time leading to improved productivity by 2 days while implementing CI/CD pipeline through GIT
Used NextJS and React-Query for data through graphQL saving 12% extra efforts
Developed [[Masala Design system]] via storybook and build its website using Gatsby
Made Components in Masala Design Lib. using react Js and typescript for UI consistency

en.title: {{Software}} Developer
en.text: Contributed to the development of Rista, a product by Dotpe which is a restraunt billing pos
list: Implemented a notification module on receiving orders , complaints ,return request etc and integrated it with the related flows leading to better UX experience
Contributed to order placing module and its connected flows till it gets executed

en.title: {{Frontend}} Developer
en.text: Joined an early stage startup that wanted to revolutionize the textile industry experience by providing 3d models and real time tryon experiences by leveraging AI
list: Implemented using ReactJs and redux while using ReactThree for rendering 3d Models in canvas
Worked on TensorFlow and used GLB files for pose detection and using three to manipulate saving 25% cost
setup CI/CD pipelines through git.

es.title: Desarrollador {{Senior Backend}}
es.text: Liderando un equipo de desarrolladores para diseñar e implementar soluciones backend para los servicios de Apple, con enfoque en:
list: Seguridad
Escalabilidad para manejar millones de usuarios a nivel global
Desarrollo de APIs RESTful
Optimización del rendimiento de bases de datos con PostgreSQL
Creación de servicios con Swift, PHP y GraphQL

fr.title: Développeur {{Senior Backend}}
fr.text: Responsable d'une équipe de développeurs pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des solutions backend pour les services Apple, en se concentrant sur :
list: La sécurité
L’évolutivité pour gérer des millions d’utilisateurs dans le monde
Le développement d’API RESTful
L’optimisation des performances des bases de données avec PostgreSQL
La création de services avec Swift, PHP et GraphQL

ko.title: {{시니어 백엔드}} 개발자
ko.text: Apple의 서비스를 위한 백엔드 솔루션을 설계하고 구현하는 개발팀을 이끌며 다음에 중점을 두고 있습니다:
list: 보안
전 세계 수백만 사용자를 처리할 수 있는 확장성
RESTful API 개발
PostgreSQL을 사용한 데이터베이스 성능 최적화
Swift, PHP, GraphQL로 서비스 구축
